name: Play With Ragdolls
description: Play With Ragdolls is a game where you play with ragdolls. You probably quessed it. There is many things you can do in the game. For example: Get ran over by a car, jump off a HUGE pile of stairs, get hit by a wrecking ball, jump off a mountain, and much more. So, what are you waiting for? Download the game now! Also check out my other Itch.io games on my page.
